com.se_project.controllers.services

Class MCQGameRepositoryService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.se_project.controllers.services.MCQGameRepositoryService

  • @Service
public class MCQGameRepositoryService
extends java.lang.Object
    The class implements the needed operations for handling the MCQ_Game repository as saving them in database or retrieving them

      • getGamesByName

        public java.util.List<com.se_project.models.MCQGame> getGamesByName(java.lang.String name)
        Get list of all MCQ games with a given name

        Note: the game name must be unique only in course but it's not unique over the courses

        Parameters:
        name - the name of the games to be retrieved
        Returns:
        list of MCQ games
